comments.author: Xiaolu @ 6 Bittersweets
comments.content: This looks flavorful and healthy.  I'll have to try it soon.

comments.author: Alessandra
comments.content:
I like fried rice, especially fried with curry, but the pinapple is not for me, sorry....

for some reason I cannot eat any savory dish with pineapple in it :-)

I used to make this often a few years ago because I had a Chinese store nearby that sold vegetarian fake meat and fish, and they had vegetarian prawns!!!

They were pink, looked like prawns, a bit chewy and tasted like salted water...but they were fun and perfect for a red curry fried rice!!!

But they don't sell them anymore...not enough vegetarian around here I guess...

comments.author: Lea
comments.content: My boyfriend's favorite is fried rice and he always insist that I should learn how to cook it. I'm inspired by your post, I'm gonna try it soon.

comments.author: Joseph's Grainery
comments.content: This looks absolutely delicious and I was stumped with how to incorporate a ripe pineapple into our plans for dinner tonight.  Thank you!
